headline: Cboe Global Markets (BATS:CBOE) Launches S&P 500 Equal Weight Index Options
summary: Cboe Global Markets (BATS:CBOE) recently launched the S&P 500 Equal Weight Index options on April 14, 2025. This product introduction could have supported the company's 13% share price increase over the last quarter. This aligns with the broader market trends, where technology and banks led gains amid easing trade tensions, as indicated by a 0.3% rise in both the S&P 500 and Nasdaq. While Cboe's new executive appointments and buyback update were relevant, the collective impact of market...
